title: Button
description: A button component with customizable properties such as variant, size, disabled state, and event handling.

variant.description: Defines the style variant of the button.

size.description: Defines the size of the button.

disabled.description: Determines if the button is disabled.

text.description: The text content displayed on the button.

onClick.description: Function called when the button is clicked. Expected to be a function reference or event handler.

icon.description: Optional icon to be displayed alongside the text in the button.

loading.description: Displays a loading spinner or state if true.

fullWidth.description: When true, the button takes up the full width of its container.

className.description: Optional custom class name for styling.
